title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, requirements, timeline, and resources needed. Set up project management tools and processes.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct user research, define user personas, gather functional and non-functional requirements for the VirtualPetCompanion app. This task also includes identifying key features, interactions, and potential challenges in augmented reality environment.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the AR component, backend services, data storage, and integration with external APIs (if required). Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects, focusing on modularity, flexibility, and adaptability to future enhancements. Review the dependencies and timelines for each component.

title: UI/UX Design for VirtualPetCompanion app
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the VirtualPetCompanion app, including AR interactions, gamification elements, and considerations for accessibility and responsive design. Collaborate with the team to incorporate feedback during the design process.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend services, including pet behavior simulation, user data management, and integration with third-party services (if needed).

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the VirtualPetCompanion app's frontend, including AR integration, UI components, and gamification features.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user data, pet data, interactions, achievements, and other relevant information. Consider data normalization, indexing, and scalability requirements. Implement data access layer with appropriate caching mechanisms.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure the app's compliance with relevant privacy regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans, write test cases, and perform various types of testing (unit, integration, end-to-end, performance, etc.) to ensure the app's quality.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, configure infrastructure and environments, and automate the deployment process.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create user guides, FAQs, and other supporting documentation. Set up user support channels and processes.
